events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been classified as a refund request due to the customer receiving an incorrect product.
Customer service agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund case for the incorrect item.
Hello! I'm Sarah from support, and Iâ€™ll assist you with your refund request for the wrong item delivered.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
The order number is 123456789. I have attached a photo showing that the item is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately and send you a confirmation email shortly.
I appreciate the quick response and am glad the refund is being processed without any issues.
The refund has been completed and you should see the amount back in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund was successfully received and there are no further issues, we are now closing this support case.
